item.title: MIUI OS2.0.2.0.VMFTWXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi 13T Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13T Taiwan

Codename: aristotle

Version: OS2.0.2.0.VMFTWXM | 15.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: 06bc0ff0c973baffddc0c616afa6ebaf

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to January 2025. Increased system security.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.103.0.VMFEUXM Recovery update for Xiaomi 13T EEA
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Xiaomi 13T EEA

Codename: aristotle

Version: OS2.0.103.0.VMFEUXM | 15.0

Size: 6.0 GB

MD5: c33a70a1ec534509c353f73c4cb64634

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
New: When quickly opening and closing apps, multiple app animations are displayed simultaneously
[System]
Updated the security patch to March 2025. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Camera]
Optimization: Watermark display adjustments
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
